These materials accompany in-person and virtual workshops. Each workshop includes setup instructions and step-by-step modules. Materials are freely available for self-study.

## Current Workshop

### [Introduction to BIGapp for Plant Breeding](bigapp-2025/index.qmd)

**Duration:** 2 hours

**Audience:** Undergraduates, graduate students, and researchers interested in applying genomics to plant breeding

**Prerequisites:** None — no coding experience required!

**Topics covered:**

- Why genomics matters for breeding decisions
- Data import and quality control
- Population structure analysis (PCA)
- Genome-wide association study (GWAS)
- Genomic selection *(optional/self-study)*

[Go to Workshop Materials →](bigapp-2025/index.qmd)

---

## Workshop Format

Workshops are designed as hands-on sessions where participants follow along using the online version of BIGapp. No software installation required — just a web browser.

::: {.callout-tip}
## Self-study
Can't attend in person? Work through the materials at your own pace! Each module includes explanations, demos, and exercises.
:::
